description: This file provides utilities for accessing environment variables with enforced naming conventions and default values, and a configuration wrapper for common environment settings in a React frontend project.

methods.name: getEnvVar(name, fallback = "")
methods.description: Retrieves an environment variable value if it starts with 'REACT_APP_', otherwise returns fallback with a warning.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The environment variable name to retrieve.

parameters.name: fallback
parameters.description: Default value if the environment variable is not set or invalid.

methods.return: The environment variable value or fallback.

methods.name: getAppConfig()
methods.description: Returns a configuration object with common environment variables and their safe defaults.
